question: Apart from  efforts towards economic integration across the region, which of the following African organizations has also served as a  peacekeeping force sending joint military forces in the times of political unrest?
option2: Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS)
answer: Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS)
explanation: ECOWAS is a 15 member community of western African countries that makes efforts towards not only economic integration but also peace keeping during times of political unrest.
